attributes.action: Prevent the introduction of an annual smoking license
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Smoker's have been targeted in this country ever since the introduction of the smoking ban, forcing us to apply for a license to smoke is an outrage, especially considering it still would not permit us to smoke in pubs, clubs or bars.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at : http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/smokingpermit/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
